column4: Hi i just upgraded ubuntu from 11.04. Not digging the vertical app/sidebar at all. anyway to remove it?
Try logging out and selecting "Ubuntu Classic"
thanks. are there many more changes? this kind of resembles the ubutu for netbook i installed months ago. Would i be better off switching to xununtu?

If you want my PERSONAL opinion, the interface I'm a big fan of on my netbook is GNOME 3. It's not supported here though. There are other distros that offer gnome 3 support officially though, like Fedora, OpenSUSE, and Arch linux.
